meanings.sent1: The preloaded game was ready to play as soon as I turned on my console.
meanings.sent2: The preloaded software made the computer start up faster.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a preloaded superhero with all my powers ready to go at a moment's notice.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a preloaded gun, always prepared for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The preloaded information in my brain helped me ace the test without studying.

meanings.sent1: I preloaded the images onto the website to ensure fast loading times.
meanings.sent2: The company preloaded the trucks with supplies for the long journey.
meanings.sent3: He preloaded the jokes before the party to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She preloaded her schedule with meetings, leaving no time for breaks.
meanings.sent5: The chef preloaded the ingredients for the recipe, making cooking a breeze.
